prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with iridescent wings and vibrant patterns.
I want a Pokemon that has a mysterious aura and can blend into forest surroundings.
Generate a whimsical insect Pokemon with colorful markings and a gentle demeanor.
Make a captivating creature that flutters gracefully and has a soothing color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in lush environments and has a playful personality.
Design a unique bug Pokemon that features a combination of purple and green hues.
Show me an enchanting Pokemon with large wings and a penchant for pollination.
